1.0.name: wordpress/admin-menu-on-right
1.0.description:
The default position for the menu in WordPress 2.7 is on the left, but since the scroll-bar is on the right, some people wanted the menu over there too. Plus a lot of blogs/websites have menus on the right so menu on the right seems to be a pretty popular option.

This plug-in moves WordPress admin menu to the right side of the screen.
